Pre-Game Insights: Cape Verde's dream of a fifth AFCON appearance was reignited with a 2-0 victory over Mauritania.

Cape Verde has demonstrated defensive resilience, keeping six clean sheets in their last eight matches across all competitions and remain unbeaten in their last five matches at home, winning four and drawing one.
Botswana's hopes of a second AFCON appearance appear likely to be delayed given their poor start to the current qualifying campaign, losing 1-0 to Mauritania and then being thrashed 4-0 by Egypt.
Didier Gomes Da Rosa's men have recorded only two wins so far, both in World Cup qualifying matches, and have failed to score in seven of 12 matches under the French coach.
